inputs.description: Enter the ESP32-S3 serial port (e.g. /dev/ttyUSB0 or /dev/ttyACM0)

tasks.label: ESP: Configure (Podman, S3)
tasks.command: if command -v host-spawn >/dev/null 2>&1; then HS=host-spawn; else HS=; fi; $HS podman run --rm -it -v ${workspaceFolder}:/work:z -v ${userHome}/.espressif:/root/.espressif:z -w /work espressif/idf:latest bash -lc 'idf.py set-target esp32s3 && cmake -S . -B build -G Ninja -DCMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS=ON && ninja -C build -t recompact'

tasks.label: ESP: Build (Podman)
tasks.command: if command -v host-spawn >/dev/null 2>&1; then HS=host-spawn; else HS=; fi; $HS podman run --rm -it -v ${workspaceFolder}:/work:z -v ${userHome}/.espressif:/root/.espressif:z -w /work espressif/idf:latest bash -lc 'idf.py -B build build'

tasks.label: ESP: Flash (Podman, choose port)
tasks.command: if command -v host-spawn >/dev/null 2>&1; then HS=host-spawn; else HS=; fi; $HS podman run --rm -it --device=${input:serialPort} --privileged -v ${workspaceFolder}:/work:z -v ${userHome}/.espressif:/root/.espressif:z -w /work espressif/idf:latest bash -lc 'idf.py -B build -p ${input:serialPort} flash'

tasks.label: ESP: Monitor (Podman, choose port)
tasks.command: if command -v host-spawn >/dev/null 2>&1; then HS=host-spawn; else HS=; fi; $HS podman run --rm -it --device=${input:serialPort} --privileged -v ${workspaceFolder}:/work:z -v ${userHome}/.espressif:/root/.espressif:z -w /work espressif/idf:latest bash -lc 'idf.py -B build -p ${input:serialPort} monitor'

tasks.label: ESP: Clean (Podman)
tasks.command: if command -v host-spawn >/dev/null 2>&1; then HS=host-spawn; else HS=; fi; $HS podman run --rm -it -v ${workspaceFolder}:/work:z -v ${userHome}/.espressif:/root/.espressif:z -w /work espressif/idf:latest bash -lc 'idf.py -B build fullclean && rm -rf build'
